name: Verify search endpoint for not allowed methods
scenarioId: search/search_product:Verify search endpoint for not allowed methods
methodName: Verify search endpoint for not allowed methods

testSteps.description: 1: Verify search endpoint for not allowed methods ({item=apple, method=POST, status code=405, error message=Method Not Allowed})

children.description: Given 'Elizabeth' wants to buy an item
When she performs search for an 'apple' using http 'POST'
Elizabeth the api user executes a POST on the resource api/v1/search/demo/{keyword}
POST https://waarkoop-server.herokuapp.com/api/v1/search/demo/apple

restQuery.responseBody:
<html>
  <head>
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"/>
    <meta charset="utf-8"/>
    <title>Application Error</title>
    <style media="screen">
      html,body,iframe {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }

      html,body {
        height: 100%;
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      iframe {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        border: 0;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <iframe frameborder="1" scrolling="auto" src="https://www.herokucdn.com/error-pages/application-error.html"/>
  </body>
</html>

children.description: Then she doesn't see the results
Elizabeth the api user should see a value that is equal to: <"keep-alive">
And '405' and 'Method Not Allowed' are shown for an 'apple'

title: Verify search endpoint for not allowed methods

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given 'Elizabeth' wants to buy an item
When she performs search for an '<item>' using http '<method>'
Then she doesn't see the results
And '<status code>' and '<error message>' are shown for an '<item>'
